1. Unzip the file (t-as2con.rxx) first.
2. Use something like DAEMON Tools to mount the ".cue" file.
3. Like what is said: Install.
4. After installing open the virtual drive (like how you open a folder) and you'll see the TiNYiSO folder...well you get the rest I guess.
The "crack" leaves the game in demo mode. It still wants a reg key and still only works for a few minutes before self-terminating.
